messages.using-product-info-content1: While every care has been taken to ensure product information is correct, food products are constantly being reformulated, so ingredients, nutrition content, dietary and allergens may change.  You should always read the product label and not rely solely on the information provided on the website.
messages.using-product-info-content2: If you have any queries, or you'd like advice on any Tesco brand products, please contact Tesco Customer Services, or the product manufacturer if not a Tesco brand product.
messages.using-product-info-content3: Although product information is regularly updated, Tesco is unable to accept liability for any incorrect information. This does not affect your statutory rights.
messages.using-product-info-content4: This information is supplied for personal use only, and may not be reproduced in any way without the prior consent of Tesco Stores Limited nor without due acknowledgement.

ProductType:276761995.title: Alpro Almond No Sugar Long Life Dairy Free Drink 1L
description: Almond drink with added calcium and vitamins.
Naturally low in fat & saturated fats
Source of vitamins B2, B12 & D
UHT for a longer shelf life
*A source of calcium. Calcium is needed for the maintenance of normal bones. A varied and balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle are recommended for good health.

At Alpro we call our products almond drinks and not almond milk- why you ask? By definition- milk is a nutrient rich food produced by mammals – and our tasty almond drinks are completely plant based! Totally nutty, but nice! Zero sugars, no sweeteners. Just the subtle, creamy taste of almonds, the real divas of the nut world. We give them the VIP treatment they deserve, roasting them ever so gently to coax out that delicate almond flavour. Drink it straight or mix it up, it’s just as good sipped from a glass, splashed on your cereal or blitzed into a shake. Fab in tea and coffee, too. Dairy free means it’s perfect for vegans. Or for all you almond lovers and anyone else who wants to pour a little extra plant-based delicious into their day. As lovely as milk might be, isn’t it great to have more choice?
ProductType:276761995.bulkBuyLimitMessage: You are able to buy a maximum of 25 of this item

allergens.name: Other Allergen Info
values: May contain traces of Nuts (no Peanuts). For allergens, see ingredients in bold.

marketing: Alpro were born plant-based, way back in 1980, and we’ve been banging that big, plant-based drum ever since. Our mission is the same now as it was then. To make delicious food that’s healthy for you and healthy for the planet. And we go the extra mile to do it. Using less water and energy. Sourcing ingredients grown in a way that puts goodness back into the earth. And developing more and more sustainable, plant-based packaging.
storage: Best before: see top of pack. Store ambient before opening. Once opened, keep refrigerated between +1 and +7°C and use within 5 days.

statements: Please speak to a healthcare professional before introducing into children's diets.

preparationAndUsage: Shake well. Can be used hot or cold, in all cooking applications as an alternative to milk.
In cereals for a full on hit of nuttiness, or awesome just as it is in a glass.
productMarketing: Alpro were born plant-based, way back in 1980, and we’ve been banging that big, plant-based drum ever since. Our mission is the same now as it was then. To make delicious food that’s healthy for you and healthy for the planet. And we go the extra mile to do it. Using less water and energy. Sourcing ingredients grown in a way that puts goodness back into the earth. And developing more and more sustainable, plant-based packaging.
brandMarketing: Good for you*, good for the planet. We’re proud to have been a certified B Corp company since 2018. Making us part of a global movement that believes businesses can be a force for good in society, and should do things in a caring, sustainable way that has a positive impact on people and planet. Like the way our almonds are grown. On small farms around the Mediterranean, where nature is nurtured, pollinating insects are protected, and the trees mostly watered by rain. And good inside, good outside! By 2025, all of our packs will be, not just recyclable, but made from 100% already recycled or plant-based materials. Bye bye, polystyrene. Hello, more recycled, recyclable PET and sustainably grown sugarcane cartons!
otherInformation: FSC - FSC® Mix, Board / Supporting responsible forestry, FSC® C014047, www.fsc.org
warnings: Please speak to a healthcare professional before introducing into children's diets.

originInformation.title: Produce of
originInformation.value: Made with Mediterranean almonds grown in Spain

nutritionalClaims: Source of vitamins B2, B12, D2, E

entries.text:
This is easily the worst option of the three almond drinks offered by Tesco.  It contains only 2.3% of almonds.
Plenish is by far the best with 5% almonds.  You can add a litre of water when you get home and you still have a better drink.  Plus it's organic.
Tesco's comes in the middle, with 2% almonds but a lot cheaper than Alpro.

entries.summary: I can get free water from the tap
entries.text:
The bottom line with these drinks is the percentage of nut or grain, in this case, almond.  Only 2.3%. as opposed to 5% for the Plenish brand.  
Alpro are very good at advertising.  They always manage to slip in 100% of something or other.
Water?... not far off.

I love this milk alternative,it tastes great and I won't use anything else,I use it in everything from a home made healthy trifle to making bread sauce I also love that it's long life so every month when I go shoppin I get 4 to last me the month and when iv finished one I pop another one in the fridge.the only downside is it is very expensive and I have tried cheaper alternatives but they don't come close to the taste.

Alpro are by far the best brand for milk alternative drinks. Tried pretty much every brand out there to discover this! I mix in a pinch of cinnamon and/or nutmeg to the milk then pour over cereal (usually wheat biscuits) and it's really nice. Just wish it was cheaper!

Delicious! I love it! But if you're making a cup of coffee, please use less coffee granules than you normally would. If you do this, you can't go wrong! And you may need to add more of this in your cups of tea. It's definitely worth switching from ordinary milk,in my humble opinion!

entries.summary: Good but much cheaper in Asda
entries.text:
Same product is £1.25 in Asda, 45p cheaper.
Product is good

entries.summary: Perfect - just need it in pint size
entries.text: Exactly what I'd hoped for taste-wise, just wish they made pints available, as I tend to throw out half the bottle after the recommended shelf life (5 days from opening)
Everything I want from an almond milk. Refreshing, has taste and even though it’s unsweetened I don’t find it to be dull. I have this daily with porridge, hot chocolate and even use it to make pies.

I purchased this last week as on Keto, I never thought for one moment I would enjoy it but I love it!, I even drink it as you would a glass of milk, it delicious, healthy and very low carb. Will definitely buy again
This has literally no flavour whatsoever. It tastes like unfresh water (no flavour with a hint of bitterness). Shocking
